intro: Elatostema fengshanense var. brachyceras, commonly known as the short-stemmed elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is characterized by its small, succulent leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are typically clustered in dense inflorescences. It is native to southern China and is adapted to grow in moist, shaded environments. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
